featured.text: After years of hard work, Kareem has not only realized his dream but also transformed a piece of 39 property into a beautiful forest.
Scientists have discovered that dreams happen mainly in REM sleep.
Events in daily life sometimes occur symbolically in dreams.
This kind of dream is called a “lucid dream.”

other.text: Daphne said that her dream for the future is to see ivory banned, all stored ivory destroyed and no one wearing an ivory ornament ever again.
When a person is having a lucid dream, the person’s body is 27 ; when a person daydreams, his/her body is awake.
If we work hard to _____ our dreams when we are young, we will not feel that we missed out on something when we get old.
However, why a dream will take a certain symbolic form is still a mystery.
The term “lucid” means clear; lucid dreamers know that they are dreaming and 26 they are dreaming of.
Nothing does surprise one in a dream.
All these kids share the same dream: Some day they could become another Derartu Tulu. 53.
23 people who say they never dream show about 20 percent of REM sleep.
He may dream at night of being alone in the playground, 28 a lion.
Yet, lucid dreaming is 28 just having a clear dream.
Yusra eventually settled in Germany and has since worked to inspire others to pursue their Popole was granted asylum in 2014 by dreams.
It was something she had dreamed of since she was five.
If you want to know what your dreams mean, now there are websites you can visit to help you _____ them.
While winning a gold _____ is what every Olympic athlete dreams of, it becomes meaningless if it is achieved by cheating.

At other times the dreaded event from daily life simply occurs in a dream in its real-life form; 29 , the boy dreams of being bullied by the bigger boy. 30 scientific research, we have known more about the relationship between sleep and dreams.
Everyone dreams about 20 percent of their sleeping time.
In the dream the cloakroom attendant at a theater stopped me in the lobby and insisted on my ___(31)___
In lucid dreams, however, we are completely immersed in the dream world.
We work very hard to realize this dream.

definition.zh_def: 夢想；在睡眠中出現的影像或感覺。
definition.en_def: A series of thoughts, images, or emotions occurring during sleep; a cherished aspiration or ideal.
definition.example: She has always wanted to travel the world, and it's her dream to visit every continent.
